#include<stdio.h>
int min(int a, int b)
{
	return (a>=b)?b:a;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,a,b,c,i,j,k;
	long long int count;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		scanf("%d %d %d %d",&n,&a,&b,&c);
		for(i=0;i<=a && i<=n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<=b && j<=(n-i);j++)
			{
					 count+=1+min(c,n-i-j);
			}
		}
		printf("%lld \n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
